title: Even the smallest change is a victory (Captioned)
creator_credit: Lance Evoy, Joy Johnson and Gary Bictel
brief_description: Seven high school students discuss the inferior status of women and their limited rights in comparison to men. They question the ways in which men control, dominate and express themselves through competition and aggression. The group feels these existing attitudes must change.
